title: JakdragonX's Kinda (???) Art Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:jakstyle]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
+ WELCOME YES THERE ARE A LOT OF CIRCLES (SORRY)
++ Art by [[*user JakdragonX]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
> [[size 125%]]I suck at art.[[/size]]
> 
> But thankfully, that's why we practice. Recently I've been getting into spraypaint art (and to a lesser extent, 3D rendering.) Since I'm still just a beginner, I figured I'd use the Wiki to help me practice. **Please feel free to recommend me articles to make art of in the comments below.**[[footnote]]I pinky promise I'll try to make something but... it may also suck. And not be perfect. Just as a forewarning.[[/footnote]]
> 
> Some of this art is subject to change as I continue to grow. Art that I feel like I could improve will be updated accordingly. However, as a beginner, this is what I have currently. I hope you enjoy!
> 
> **NOTE:** All art is done physically. So I have to do some fuckery to get it to become digital.
@@ @@
+ CURRENT TIER: BEGINNER
@@ @@
[[=]]
[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/jakdragonx-art/5140.jpg]]
